JobFullDesc:
Kinesso brings together top talent in data, technology and media activation to deliver seamless data-driven marketing solutions. As a technology-enabler, Kinesso powers marketing systems through a proprietary suite of applications that seamlessly integrate ad tech and martech. Kinesso’s application framework spans audience, planning and activation, delivering insights and business outcomes for leading global brands.

We are looking for a talented individual who can lead our API practice which connects our proprietary technology to internal & external partners. You’re incredibly passionate about technology, have a firm grasp of how API’s function, and have a deep understanding of the media landscape. This role seeks & fosters opportunities that may lead to shaping & evolving our technology & business. You are integral in building our API program from the ground up, developing strategic API approaches, being a champion of the practice and leading opportunities by working with startups, IPG agencies, Educational institutions, and media companies.

The API Product Director evangelizes all facets of creating and maintaining API development both internally, and externally. You strategize with Product teams on ensuring that the product supports the company’s overall strategy and goals, and is fit for use.

Job Responsibilities


Serve as point-of-contact between Enterprise partners and internal business teams 
Develop & lead a CoE for API management 
Understand and leverage Kinesso’s Product ecosystem in order to build an ecosystem-wide API practice  
Identify and recommend API-related opportunities internally and externally 
Collaborate with Product & Engineering teams on distilling business opportunities to tactical plans 
Develop and present quarterly roadmap presentations 
Oversee the launch & maintenance of our public-facing API portal 
Create strategies for growing our API program & business in terms of revenue growth, product/portfolio penetration, customer satisfaction (e.g. NPS) and overall profitability 
Work closely with Kinesso leadership on key decision-making matters 

Desired Skills & Experience


Knowledgeable of entire media landscape & processes  
Basic understanding of user-centric approaches 
Ability to work with design and technical teams 
Experience developing & leading a CoE for API management. 
Experience working with & selling SaaS products & services 
Understanding of APIs, Restful APIs, and/or GraphQL APIs 
Proven experience in a Project/Product/Program Management capacity 
Clear communicator and well organized 
Self-starter with a passion to drive & succeed 
Strong business writing & presentation skills 
Demonstrated business acumen 
Ability to build and maintain partnerships 
Technical skills preferred
